column1: I used your children to manipulate you.
I tried to keep you from doing something you wanted to do.
I told you you were a bad parent.
I threatened to throw something at you.
I stopped you from going to work.
I said things to scare you.
I put you on an allowance.
I put down your family and friends.
I prevented you from having money for your own use.
I made you do something humiliating.
I gave you angry stares or looks.
I ended a discussion with you and made the decision myself.
I drove recklessly when you were in the car.
I checked up on you repeatedly.
I called you names and/or criticized you.
I became upset with you because dinner was not ready when I got home.
I accused you of paying attention to someone else.
